Subject: DevRev Partnership Opportunity for Moderna Inc

Hi Moderna Inc team,

I've been following Moderna Inc's innovative work in the SaaS space and am impressed by your platform's growth.

At DevRev, we help SaaS companies like Moderna Inc connect customer feedback directly to engineering teams, enabling faster product iterations and better customer satisfaction.

Many SaaS companies struggle with the disconnect between customer support and product development. DevRev bridges this gap.

Would you be open to a brief 15-minute conversation to explore how DevRev could help Moderna Inc accelerate your product development cycle?

Best regards,
DevRev Sales Team

Dear Salesforce Leadership Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm reaching out from DevRev, a company that specializes in customer-driven development and revenue operations. We've been closely following Salesforce's journey and are impressed by your commitment to innovation, particularly with the recent launch of Agentforce. 

We understand that you've been facing scalability and cost-efficiency challenges, especially with the surge in unstructured data growth. DevRev's platform is designed to handle high volumes of data and can easily scale to accommodate your needs. Our solution leverages AI to optimize resource allocation, reducing costs and improving system reliability. 

We've also noted the skepticism and operational friction you've encountered with the deployment of AI agents. Our platform is built to be user-friendly and adaptable, with a focus on common enterprise workflows. We believe this approach can help alleviate implementation concerns and demonstrate the tangible business value of AI agents.

We'd love to explore how we can collaborate to address these challenges. Would you be open to a brief call next week to discuss how DevRev can support Salesforce's growth and innovation journey?

Best regards,
John Doe
DevRev Sales Team

Dear Adobe Systems Leadership Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm reaching out from DevRev, a company that specializes in customer-driven operations and software development. We understand the complexities of managing a global software company like Adobe and believe we can offer solutions to streamline your operations and enhance customer experience.

Our platform integrates customer success, product, and engineering teams into one seamless operation. This integration can help Adobe to respond more quickly to customer feedback, improve product development, and ultimately drive revenue growth. We've seen great success with other software companies and believe we can achieve similar results with Adobe.

We would love the opportunity to discuss how DevRev can specifically help Adobe Systems. If you're open to it, could we schedule a call next week to discuss this in more detail? I'm confident that our services can provide significant value to your operations and customer relations.

Best regards,
John Doe
DevRev Sales Team

Dear Microsoft Leadership Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I recently read about the challenges Microsoft has been facing with the surge in scams and deepfake attacks on your advertising platforms. At DevRev, we understand the importance of maintaining trust and safety in digital spaces, and we have developed advanced AI-based solutions that can help mitigate these threats. Our AI systems are designed to detect and moderate malicious activities, ensuring the integrity of your platforms.

In addition, we noticed your commendable efforts in modernizing your Treasury operation by migrating from legacy infrastructure to Azure cloud. As a company that specializes in cloud-based solutions, we can offer our expertise to ensure a smooth transition. Our team at DevRev has extensive experience in dealing with technical debt and can provide strategies to address these issues while enhancing the agility and resilience of your financial operations.

We believe that a partnership with DevRev can help Microsoft overcome these challenges and continue to lead in the tech industry. We would love the opportunity to discuss how our solutions can be tailored to meet your specific needs. Please let us know a convenient time for you to schedule a call or a meeting.

Best regards,
John Doe
DevRev Sales Team

Dear SAP Leadership Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I recently read about the challenges SAP has been facing in adapting to the dynamic global regulatory environment and enhancing the developer experience. At DevRev, we understand the importance of these issues and have solutions that can help.

Our platform is designed to streamline compliance and sustainability reporting, making it easier to adapt to changing regulations. We also offer tools that can help you integrate data across business units, ensuring a more cohesive and efficient operation. Furthermore, our AI-driven tools like Joule and ABAP Cloud can enhance your product innovation efforts and accelerate intelligent automation, all while maintaining system integrity.

We would love to have a conversation about how DevRev can help SAP overcome these challenges. Our team is ready to provide a personalized demonstration of our platform and discuss how we can tailor our solutions to meet your specific needs. Please let us know a suitable time for you and we can arrange a meeting at your earliest convenience.


DevRev

Best regards,
John Doe
DevRev Sales Team
